about_the_game:
Welcome to the enchanting world of "Animal Buddies - Party Beasts" – a delightful game where players embark on thrilling adventures controlling a cast of adorable animals, from the cute mouse to the captivating capybara. Immerse yourself in a vibrant universe filled with diverse challenges and exciting gameplay features.

Features:
• Diverse Challenges: Traverse unique locations with collapsing platforms on snowy mountain tops, engage in intense survival battles against other animals, and heroically participate in flag capturing missions.
• Objective-based Tasks: Experience the thrill of delivering boxes and pulling wagons filled with glittering gold. Each level introduces new tasks, ensuring a fresh and exciting gameplay experience.
• Companion System: Unlock and collect magical cups as rewards for successful missions, introducing new animal friends and adding a colorful dimension to your adventure.
• Character Customization: Personalize your animals with various accessories and skins, enhancing your unique gaming experience.
• Leaderboards and Challenges: Implement leaderboards and challenges to foster healthy competition among players.
• User-friendly Controls: Suitable for all ages and skill levels, ensuring an accessible and enjoyable experience for everyone.
• Lively Soundtrack: Enhance the overall atmosphere with a lively and engaging soundtrack.
This game aims to create a captivating gaming experience through its diverse gameplay, charming characters, and engaging multiplayer features. The game's focus on fun and adventure ensures an enjoyable experience for players of all ages. Join the party and let the adventures begin!

name: Animal Buddies - Party Beasts

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
